#text=I decided to bake a chocolate cake yesterday .
#text=First , I consulted my recipe book and found the recipe I wanted to use .
#text=Next , I looked through my kitchen and made sure that I had all the ingredients that I needed for my cake .
#text=I did have them , so I began to pull them all out .
#text=I preheated the oven , and greased a cake pan .
#text=I mixed up all of the ingredients in a big mixing bowl .
#text=I poured the mixture carefully into the cake pan .
#text=I carefully placed it into the oven and set the timer according to the recipe .
#text=While the cake was baking , I cleaned up the mess in the kitchen .
#text=Then I made chocolate frosting to go on the cake .
#text=The timer buzzed , I pulled the cake out of the oven and saw that it was done .
#text=Once it was cool , I took the frosting I had just made and frosted the cake .
#text=The cake was complete and I served it to my family for dessert after dinner that night .
